com.adobe.acs.commons.oakpal.checks

Class RecommendEnsureOakIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.acs.commons.oakpal.checks.RecommendEnsureOakIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.adamcin.oakpal.api.ProgressCheckFactory

    public final class RecommendEnsureOakIndex
extends Object
implements net.adamcin.oakpal.api.ProgressCheckFactory
    Report explicitly-imported oak:index nodes as violations to encourage migration to ACS AEM Commons - Ensure Oak Index. config items:
    severity
    (default: Severity.MINOR) specify the severity of violations reported by this check.
    scopePaths (type: Rule[])
    (default: allow all) specify a list of pattern rules to allow or deny import paths from the scope of this check. When no pattern rules are specified, ALLOW ALL imported paths into scope for the check. When the first rule is type ALLOW, the default first rule becomes DENY ALL.
    recommendation
    (default: DEFAULT_RECOMMENDATION) provide a recommendation message.
